dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') loc_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')) loc_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER')) loc_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'TEL: 877-905-8525' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'TEL: 630-874-2918' ELSE '' END) loc_phone, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'FAX: 913-696-9240' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'FAX: 630-493-1402' ELSE '' END) loc_fax, sref1.shipment_refnum_value cust_ref_no, TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.unit_net_weight FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'999,999,990.00') gross_weight, (SELECT ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) gross_weight_uom, (SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN item it ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) descript_of_cargo, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER') shipper_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province( (SELECT orel.source_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid)) source_location, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province( (SELECT orel.dest_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid)) destination_location, j.job_xid bill_lading, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( (SELECT MIN(ship3.attribute_date2) FROM shipment ship1 INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON ship1.shipment_gid = vsor1.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj2.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN (SELECT ship2.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship2 WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship2.shipment_gid AND ship2.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment ship3 ON vsor2.shipment_gid = ship3.shipment_gid AND ship3.perspective = 'B' WHERE ship1.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID),'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY') departure_date, TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)) containers FROM shipment sh LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor1.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj1.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj2.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO NUMBER' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') loc_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') loc_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER')), 'Data Missing in System') loc_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'TEL: 877-905-8525' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'TEL: 630-874-2918' ELSE '' END) loc_phone, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'FAX: 913-696-9240' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'FAX: 630-493-1402' ELSE '' END) loc_fax, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') cust_ref_no, NVL(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.unit_net_weight FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'999,999,990.00'), 'Data Missing in System') gross_weight, NVL((SELECT ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1), 'Data Missing in System') gross_weight_uom, NVL((SELECT it.description FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN item it ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1), 'Data Missing in System') descript_of_cargo, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province( (SELECT orel.source_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid)), 'Data Missing in System') source_location, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_province( (SELECT orel.dest_location_gid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor1.order_release_gid)), 'Data Missing in System') destination_location, NVL(j.job_xid, 'Data Missing in System') bill_lading, NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE( (SELECT MIN(ship3.attribute_date2) FROM shipment ship1 INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON ship1.shipment_gid = vsor1.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj2.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN (SELECT ship2.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship2 WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship2.shipment_gid AND ship2.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment ship3 ON vsor2.shipment_gid = ship3.shipment_gid AND ship3.perspective = 'B' WHERE ship1.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID),'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY'), 'Data Missing in System') departure_date, NVL(TRIM((SELECT listagg (ssunit.tag_3, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ssunit.tag_3) FROM s_ship_unit ssunit INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)),'Data Missing in System') containers FROM shipment sh LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor1.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj1.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj2.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO NUMBER' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN inv.invoice_xid ELSE NVL(inv.invoice_xid, 'Data Missing in System') END) invoice_xid, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(inv.invoice_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY') ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(inv.invoice_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY'), 'Data Missing in System') END) invoice_date, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN gpr.refnum_value ELSE NVL(gpr.refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') END) invoice_terms, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(inv.net_due_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY') ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(inv.net_due_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YY'), 'Data Missing in System') END) invoice_due_date, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN invr.remark_text ELSE NVL(invr.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) remark_text, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TO_CHAR(inv.net_amount_due, '999,999,990.00') ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(inv.net_amount_due, '999,999,990.00'), 'Data Missing in System') END) total_amount, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN loc.location_name ELSE NVL(loc.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') END) exporter_name, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc.location_gid) ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc.location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') END) exporter_address, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc.location_gid) ELSE NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc.location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') END) exporter_city_state_zip FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN gtm_party_refnum gpr ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = gpr.contact_gid AND gpr.gtm_party_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PAYMENT TERMS NVO DOMESTIC' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_bill sb ON s.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_remark invr ON sb.bill_gid = invr.invoice_gid AND remark_qual_identifier = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.FREIGHT INVOICE REMARKS' LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice inv ON sb.bill_gid = inv.invoice_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_involved_party iip ON inv.invoice_gid = iip.invoice_gid AND iip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON iip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON con.location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT b.shipment_cost_seqno, b.cost_type, b.cost_total FROM (SELECT a.shipment_cost_seqno, TRIM(a.cost_type) cost_type, a.cost_total FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc.shipment_cost_seqno, (CASE WHEN sc.cost_type = 'A' THEN (CASE WHEN sc.accessorial_code_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.CONSOLIDATION' THEN ((SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value)) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) || ' ' || (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' at ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(sc.cost,'999,999,990.00'))) ELSE (SELECT ac.accessorial_code_xid FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = sc.accessorial_code_gid) || ' @ ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(sc.cost,'999,999,990.00')) END) ELSE ' LINE HAUL @ ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(sc.cost,'999,999,990.00')) END) cost_type, TO_CHAR(sc.cost,'999,999,990.00') cost_total FROM shipment_cost sc INNER JOIN shipment s ON sc.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE sc.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY sc.shipment_cost_seqno) a) b WHERE (SELECT COUNT(ilit.lineitem_seq_no) FROM shipment_bill sbl INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ilit ON sbl.bill_gid = ilit.invoice_gid WHERE sbl.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID) = 0 UNION SELECT c.lineitem_seq_no, TRIM(c.cost_type) cost_type, c.cost_total FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ili.lineitem_seq_no, (CASE WHEN ili.cost_type_gid = 'A' THEN (CASE WHEN ili.accessorial_code_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.CONSOLIDATION' THEN ((SELECT SUM(TO_NUMBER(ssur.refnum_value)) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1) || ' ' || (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) || ' at ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ili.freight_charge,'999,999,990.00'))) ELSE (SELECT ac.accessorial_code_xid FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = ili.accessorial_code_gid) || ' @ ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ili.freight_charge,'999,999,990.00')) END) ELSE ' LINE HAUL @ ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ili.freight_charge,'999,999,990.00')) END) cost_type, TO_CHAR(ili.freight_charge,'999,999,990.00') cost_total FROM shipment ship INNER JOIN shipment_bill sb ON ship.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid INNER JOIN invoice_lineitem ili ON sb.bill_gid = ili.invoice_gid WHERE ship.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY ili.lineitem_seq_no) c

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM((CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TO_CHAR(SUM(TO_NUMBER(a.piece_count)),'999,999,990') ELSE NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(TO_NUMBER(a.piece_count)),'999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') END)) num_pieces, a.piece_type FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid, ssur1.refnum_value piece_count, ssur2.refnum_value piece_type FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor1 ON sh.shipment_gid = vsor1.shipment_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN job j ON jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON vsor1.order_release_gid = jorj2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = vsor2.order_release_gid AND vsor2.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT ship.shipment_gid FROM shipment ship WHERE vsor2.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'B') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.perspective = 'B' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID) a GROUP BY a.piece_type
